data.text: @andreavhowe Loved the show, have to read the book now 😁
@andreavhowe I was just thinking about some of the eerie parallels with that book! Nice pull.

@andreavhowe The good news, is that it also served to unite critical thinking people from both sides of the aisle that will now work together to forestall/prevent a reoccurrence. We are the new middle, where nuanced conversations about difficult topics is respected, not vilified.
@ellisthinkery Get to it soon. It’s so beautifully written
@andreavhowe The result/point of the last two years was to divide us. On many levels, that worked.
@andreavhowe It’s on my nightstand right now!
